Title: Bombard the capitalist headquarters (the great cultural revolution will shine forever group painting 2)
Designer: Cultural Revolution Collective Painting Creative Group (文化大革命组画创作组)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: The title of this poster quotes the August 1966 big character poster by Mao, in which he accused other party leaders of treasonous and capitalist points of view and urged his supporters to overthrow his enemies. Big character posters were used extensively during the Cultural Revolution.
